original_text: Are we not counted of him strangers? for he hath sold us, and hath quite devoured also our money.
korean_text: 아버지가 우리를 팔고 우리의 돈을 다 먹어버렸으니 아버지가 우리를 외국인처럼 여기는 것이 아닌가

sentences.original_text: Are we not counted of him strangers?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그에게 낯선 사람으로 여기지 않았느냐?

sentences.original_text: and hath quite devoured also our money
